aboutpara: I am Caleb Hiemstra, a recent Computer Systems Technician graduate from Conestoga College, with hands-on experience in IT support, troubleshooting, and network design. During my co-op positions at VLInteractive, I responded to IT tickets, set up and troubleshot computers, installed software, maintained hardware, and contributed to long-term IT projects. I have strong skills in C and Python development, Windows administration tools, and the Microsoft 365 Suite. I excel at solving IT problems, engaging with clients, and have a passion for all things computers, including building my first computer in 2017 and an interest in cybersecurity.

resume.description: Experienced in IT support, troubleshooting, network design, and development with C and Python. Passionate about all things computers.

education.universityPara: Program focuses on installing, configuring, and troubleshooting workstations and server computers, networks, and virtual infrastructure. Practical work is completed on industry-standard hardware and software encountered in the workplace.

previousEducation.universityPara: Completed courses in Digital and Analog Electronics, Embedded Systems, Software, Signal Processing, Communication Systems, Math, and Physics. Project-based learning with hands-on skill development and exposure to engineering environments and processes.

previousEducation.universityName: Woodland Christian High School, Breslau, Ontario

activities.title: First Robotics competitions
activities.description: Participated as a scout, collecting and collating data on other teams. Helped the team make it to the World Championship from 2017-2019.
